creator: Ed_Landman@nl.ibm.com
text:
apache 2.0.54
aix 5.3 ml03
c++ v6 for aix
.
Run configure with --enable-so --prefix=/noel/apache  -->ok
make  -->ok
make install  -->ok
.
This was all working but when starting ./apachectl start, i get the following
errors:
.
# ./apachectl start
exec(): 0509-036 Cannot load program /noel/apache/bin/httpd because of the
following errors:
rtld: 0712-001 Symbol __udivdi3 was referenced
      from module /noel/apache/lib/libapr-0.so(), but a runtime definition
      of the symbol was not found.
rtld: 0712-001 Symbol __lshrdi3 was referenced
      from module /noel/apache/lib/libapr-0.so(), but a runtime definition
      of the symbol was not found.
rtld: 0712-001 Symbol __divdi3 was referenced
      from module /noel/apache/lib/libapr-0.so(), but a runtime definition
      of the symbol was not found.
rtld: 0712-001 Symbol __moddi3 was referenced
      from module /noel/apache/lib/libapr-0.so(), but a runtime definition
      of the symbol was not found.
        0509-026 System error: Error 0
.
Can`t find much on the internet

You're actually using gcc.  Look at

B14 - gcc-built httpd can't load some DSOs

on

http://people.apache.org/~trawick/aixstatus.html

for similar error messages.  Googling for some of the symbols you had unresolved
also points to gcc.

If you want to use the IBM compiler, set CC=xlc_r before running configure.
If you switched compilers sometime after unpacking Apache, run "make distclean"
before re-running configure.
creator: trawick@apache.org
Ed_Landman@nl.ibm.com
text:
Hi,
Due a busy time i wasn´t able to test it,but i finaly did and solution was 
indeed -->
If you want to use the IBM compiler, set CC=xlc_r before running configure.
If you switched compilers sometime after unpacking Apache, run "make distclean"
before re-running configure. <----
.
I ran in to another problem but that has to do with missing a prereq of the 
X11.compat fileset.

creator: Ed_Landman@nl.ibm.com
text:
Did action :->
set CC=xlc_r
make distclean
this works
